name: Season Code
Add Project
script:
#doc_name = self.name
selfdoc = frappe.form_dict.get("name")
doc_name = frappe.form_dict.get("name")
#doc_subject = selfdoc.subject # Example: replace with actual field name

# Create a new Task document
project = frappe.new_doc("Project")
project.project_name = doc_name
project.project_template = "Product Launch"
project.parent_document = doc_name
project.parent = doc_name
project.article = doc_name
project.save()

frappe.db.commit()
#return {"message": "Project created successfully"}
